message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that I believe will greatly benefit your business. I am offering it to you for $1,500,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. However, that price is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to buy the product for $800,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. While we're unable to match the initial asking price, I'm willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer the product to you for $950,000.
Alice, I appreciate you moving a bit on the price.  To be honest, $900,000 is the highest I can go.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $925,000 for our product. This allows us to maintain a fair profit while still making the product accessible to you.
